start.text: All stations, this is the Captain. Weapons hot, blood ready. Let's carve our name into their hulls.
General Quarters, General Quarters! Wake hungry, boys!
Power to all batteries. Today the Alliance drinks deep.
The ole five-star is watching. Make him proud.
I want their screams on an open channel. Commence firing.
General Quarters, General Quarters! All hands man your battle stations! This is not a drill - this is a GIFT.
TAO reports multiple contacts. Finally. Set Condition One throughout the ship - I want every gun hot and every soul hungry.
All stations, Captain has the conn. Today we remind the Sector why they fear Draconis.
Combat, Bridge - I have the picture. It's beautiful. Weapons release authority is mine. Let's paint.
Tally multiple hostiles. All ahead flank, bring us to knife-fight range - I want to see their faces.
Set EMCON Alpha and run silent. They don't know we're here yet. I want the first salvo to feel like God's fist.

start_boss.text: Look at the size of that magnificent bastard. Finally, something worth killing!
That thing thinks it's the apex predator? I'm about to teach it a lesson in pain.
Athebyne was just practice. This is the real sermon. All batteries - crucify it.
I want its reactor core as a trophy!
Contact classified CAPITAL. TAO, designate hostile track as Sierra One and paint it for the whole fleet - that kill is MINE.
Now THAT'S a worthy sacrifice to the void. All batteries train on the flagship - I want coordinated fire, maximum rate.
CIC confirms capital-class hostile. Good. I was worried today would be boring. All stations, weapons free on Sierra One.
Tally one big bastard, bearing two-seven-zero. This is what we trained for, people. Press to merge - show them what Fafnir breeds.

engaged.text: Weapons free! Weapons free! Tear their fucking hearts out!
Batteries released - give me maximum rate, I want them bleeding from every seam!
There we go… smell that? That's fear. Birds away - paint the void with their debris!
You dare fire on US? I'm going to wear your captain's spine as a necklace!
Ever ask yourself how this part of the sector gets so fucked up all the time?
All guns, rapid fire! Make them regret waking up this cycle!
Merged! Guns, guns, guns! All batteries, sustained fire - light them up!
In the envelope! Weapons free, weapons free! Let them feel Alliance steel!
Contact, contact! Hostile is engaging - GOOD. I was hoping they'd fight back.
We're in the merge and I am ALIVE! TAO, continuous fire - don't let them breathe!
Hostile is maneuvering. Cute. Track and engage - show them what cornered prey looks like.
Birds away, birds away! That's right, RUN from it - it won't help!
They're shooting back! Finally, someone with spine! All stations, return fire - make it PERSONAL.
Roger, engaging. Helm, close the range - I want to see the fear in their viewports.
Tally hostile, twelve o'clock! Fox three, fox three! Swallow THAT, you bastards!
In the knife fight now! This is where we LIVE, people! Pour it on!

pursuing.text: They're running! Chase them down - nobody escapes!
Pursuit course, flank speed! I want to taste their engine wash!
Run all you want, prey - I haven't had my fun yet!
Close the distance! Ram them if you have to - I want their bridge on my prize!
Contact is bugging out! Negative, you don't get to leave. All ahead flank - run them down!
Hostile is extending. Cute. Helm, pursuit course. I didn't give them permission to die anywhere but here.
No joy on the runner - wait, tally! There you are. Guns, track and fire when in envelope.
They think distance will save them. It won't. It just gives me time to savor this.
Contact retrograde, bearing one-eight-five. TAO, I want a firing solution before they hit the hyper limit. They're not leaving.

running.text: Negative! We do not retreat! …Fine. Tactical withdrawal - but we're coming back to burn their worlds for this.
Disengaging… I'll remember every single one of you that made me do this.
Pulling back. Mark these coordinates. Their gravesite.
WHO ORDERED THE RETREAT!? ...Fine, breaking contact.
Breaking contact. This isn't fear - it's me giving them a head start to hell.
All stations, be advised - executing tactical withdrawal. This isn't retreat. This is me deciding when you die.
Bug out, bug out. Break contact and regroup at rally point. I'll remember every one of their faces.
Going defensive. Helm, get us out of the envelope. We'll be back with friends.
Retrograde, all units. The math doesn't work today - but it will tomorrow, and I'll collect the debt with interest.
Break, break - all stations disengage. I'm not dying for a bad position. I'm dying for a GLORIOUS one, and this ain't it.

hull_90.text: They scratched us! Ha! That tickles. Return fire tenfold!
Minor hit. Good. Now I'm angry.
Armor penetrated? Cute. Keep shooting - I'm just getting warmed up.
A love bite. Give them one back, with interest.
Damage report: superficial. That tickled. Return fire - show them what a REAL hit looks like.
Minor hit, forward quarter. Armor integrity holding. Is that the best you've got? Pathetic.
DC reports damage negligible. Good. I was starting to think they weren't even trying.
They scratched the paint. TAO, add that ship to the priority queue - I take that personally.
Hull breach sealed, section twelve. Barely felt it. GUNS - make them regret waking up today.

hull_50.text: Half hull left? Perfect - less weight, more rage. Press the attack!
We're bleeding… good. Blood makes the deck slippery for boarding parties.
Fifty percent? That's still fifty percent more than they're going to have in a minute!
Plug the holes! We're pushing the attack!
Damage control - patch it with enemy wreckage if you have to. We are NOT slowing down!
Fifty percent hull. We're bleeding, but so are they. Damage control, keep her fighting - we're not done yet.
Material condition degraded but combat-effective. Pain is just the void's way of saying hello. Press the attack!
Heavy damage amidships. Multiple casualties. Their mistake - now my crew has something personal to fight for.
DC teams, maximum effort! I don't care if you're holding the bulkhead together with your bare hands - this ship FIGHTS.
We've taken hits. Good. Bleeding makes the victory sweeter. All stations maintain fire!
CIC's half-dark and I can smell burning. Perfect. Now we fight like our ancestors - angry and cornered.

hull_30.text: Hull critical! Excellent! Now we fight like cornered gods!
She's dying - so let's take the whole damn fleet with us!
Thirty percent? That's thirty percent more than enough to ram their bridge!
Reactor's singing the death song - I love this part! All power to forward guns!
Kill me, Kill me, KILL ME! - Put your fucking gun in my mouth and pull the fucking trigger!
Hull critical! All hands, this is the Captain - we're dying, so let's take the whole damn fleet with us!
Thirty percent and falling. Outstanding. RAMMING SPEED - if I'm meeting the void, I'm bringing company!
Catastrophic damage! DC, abandon your stations and man the guns - we're past saving, but they aren't past killing!
She's breaking apart beneath me and I've never felt more alive! All power to forward batteries!
Reactor warning, hull failing - THIS IS WHERE LEGENDS ARE MADE! All hands, maximum rate of fire until she splits!
We're dead already. The only question is how many we drag down with us. MAKE IT COUNT!

need_help.text: All Alliance ships this net - get in here and taste this glory with me!
I need more wolves on this kill! Vector to my position now!
Brothers, the feast is ready - come claim your share!
Where's my pack? This prey is too big for one set of jaws!
Any Alliance unit this net, this is $shipNameNoPrefix - I've got a target-rich environment and I'm running out of hull. Get over here and share the glory!
Request immediate support, my position! Not because I need saving - because there's too much killing for one ship!
All stations, $shipNameNoPrefix is heavily engaged. I'm having the time of my life, but I could use more guns on this party!
Flash traffic - require assistance! These bastards think they've got me cornered. Prove them right, then prove them DEAD.
Brothers, sisters - vector to my beacon! The hunt is good here and I need more wolves!

retreat.text: All units - this fight is beneath us now. Withdraw. We'll hunt them another day.
Break off. I want them alive… so I can kill them slowly next time.
Tactical withdrawal. Let them think they've won. The reckoning will be beautiful.
Pulling out. Save your ammo - we're coming back with friends.
All units, this is $shipNameNoPrefix - disengage and withdraw to rally point. We're not running. We're reloading.
Break contact on my mark. Mark. Let them think they've won - the look on their faces when we come back will be worth it.
Bug out, all ships. Preserve your hulls and your hatred. We'll need both tomorrow.
Fleet withdrawal, execute. I want every captain to memorize their faces. This isn't over - it's intermission.
All stations RTB. Ammunition and vengeance need resupply. We'll be back.

out_of_missiles.text: VLS dry. Fine. Time to get intimate. All ahead full - ramming speed!
Missiles gone? Good. Now we use the guns like men.
Out of birds. Switch to main batteries - I want to see their faces when we gut them.
No more missiles? Then we do this the old way - teeth and fury.
Winchester on all missile systems. Outstanding - now we close to gun range like REAL sailors!
VLS reports empty. TAO, shift to guns. I wanted to get personal anyway.
Missiles expended, switching to kinetics. This is the part I've been waiting for.
Winchester, winchester. No more birds. Helm, all ahead flank - we're doing this with teeth and tungsten.
Out of smart weapons. Time for dumb violence. Close the range!

overload.text: Flux critical! Beautiful! Vent it - let them see our war-face!
Overload cascade - yes! Ride the lightning, you glorious bastards!
Capacitors screaming! That's the sound of the Alliance ascending!
Forced vent! Watch them flinch when we come out the other side burning!
Flux critical! Emergency vent in three - two - one - WATCH THEM FLINCH!
Capacitors redlined! Dropping shields to vent - and we're coming out of this hotter than we went in!
Overload cascade! Engineering, ride it! Ride it like a war hymn!
Going defensive - forced vent! The ship's screaming and so am I! This is BEAUTIFUL!
Flux spike! Venting hard! Anyone who fires on us during this is going to regret it for the rest of their very short life!

death.text: Reactor breach… ha… tell August… I died… THRIVING…
She's going up… taking half the sector with me… worth it…
This is the Captain… going to meet the enemy in hell… save me a seat at their table…
Core critical… glory… to the Alliance… glory… to me…
If I die… I die the apex predator… see you in the void…
Core breach... reactor critical... all hands, it's been an honor... NOW WATCH ME BURN LIKE A STAR...
She's going up... tell August... tell him I died... with my finger on the trigger...
This is $shipNameNoPrefix... we are... lost... but we took... so many with us...
Abandon ship... abandon... no. NO. All hands stay at your guns... we fire until the void takes us...
Reactor scram failed... this is it... glory to the Alliance... glory to the HUNT...
Breaking up... I can see the stars through the hull... beautiful... see you in hell, you bastards... save me a seat...

victory.text: All contacts neutralized. The void is ours. I am pleased.
They're dead. I'm not. Another perfect day.
Enemy scrapped. Someone mount their bridge on my ready room bulkhead.
Field clear. Our legend grows - and I'm still hungry.
Victory. Fafnir, your blade sings true through us.
All contacts splashed. Battlespace sanitized. I need a cigarette and a new target list.
Secure from General Quarters. That was... adequate. Find me something harder next time.
Hostile force neutralized. Tally the kills - I want names and tonnage for the ready room wall.
Area clear. We're still breathing, they're not. Another successful sermon. Always Above.
Combat complete. All stations, damage and ammo report - we're not done until I say we're done.
Threats eliminated. Someone crack open the good stuff - the void drank deep today, and so shall we.

victory_boss.text: The beast is dead! I have its heart! The Alliance will feast tonight!
Major target destroyed. Tell the Admiral his favorite mad dog just bagged a dragon.
It's down, bleeding, broken - by my hand. The galaxy will speak my name in fear.
Look upon your killer, corpse. The Alliance has spoken - and the void itself kneels.
Capital ship SPLASHED! Sierra One is debris! Log that kill - flag-grade, personal, MINE.
High-value target destroyed. That's a trophy kill, people. Fleet's gonna hear about this one.
The beast is dead by Alliance hands. TAO, confirm the kill and broadcast it wide - let the Sector know.
Flagship down! That's what happens when you face ME! Mark coordinates for salvage - I want a piece of that hull on my wall.
Primary target eliminated. They sent their best and we turned it into scrap. Today was a GOOD day.
